meanings.sent1: The teacher was ejecting the troublemaker from the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The machine was ejecting coins when the button was pressed.
meanings.sent3: The toaster seemed to be ejecting the bread slices with a playful bounce.
meanings.sent4: The volcano was ejecting hot lava into the air, creating a fiery spectacle.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's powers included ejecting beams of light from his hands.

meanings.sent1: The security guard was ejecting the unruly fan from the concert.
meanings.sent2: The spaceship was ejecting excess fuel before the launch.
meanings.sent3: The sneezing panda looked like it was ejecting confetti instead of sneezes.
meanings.sent4: The factory was ejecting smoke into the sky, polluting the air.
meanings.sent5: The pressure release valve was ejecting steam to prevent an explosion.

meanings.sent1: The mechanic was ejecting the faulty part from the engine.
meanings.sent2: The body was ejecting toxins through the process of sweating.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to be ejecting endless scarves during the show.
meanings.sent4: The dam was ejecting excess water to prevent flooding in the area.
meanings.sent5: The computer was ejecting the CD with a smooth, automated motion.
